Introduction

SHINHWA WDJ (Korean: 신화 WDJ; Japanese: シン・ファWDJ; also known as WDJ) is the first sub-unit of SHINHWA. They debuted on December 6, 2022 with the mini album "Come To Life".


Their name "WDJ" is an abbreviation for "Wonder, Dynamic, Joyful".
